Parking actually for the excursion point

However, the lagoon has completely dried up. so it is rarely visited.
A very very quiet place.
In the midst of olive plantations.
No problems.

The place is right on the bike path
"Via Verde del Aceite"
This bike path is an open railway line. (olive oil train). In this area it runs through a very beautiful part of Andalusia. Over bridges and small gorges, almost flat.
Ideal for small bike tours.

We only have 12 plots that give you an authentic family atmosphere and with a 100% guarantee of disconnection and relaxation. The 12 plots with access to electricity and 6 plots without electricity. In La Posada, which is 100 meters away, is the reception. There is a bar and very good internet connection. In spring and summer the Garden works and it is possible to buy totally organic vegetables or share a good time with the "Innkeeper"

Being about 20 meters from the road, vehicles can be heard but there is little traffic, since it is a secondary road that goes from Priego to Rute passing through villages. They fit 3 AC of 7.5m, the maneuver is easy and it is quite flat, in general very quiet. The townspeople / hamlet come by and say hello kindly.

title: (23600) Martos - 2F Calle Niño Jesús
description:
Large parking area with a long promenade with good views of the city and close to the old town so you can park and visit it on foot. There is also a recently built playground for the little ones. In winter it is usually quiet but in summer it is more crowded in the afternoons since people go up there to eat and hang out, taking advantage of the fact that due to its location there is usually a breeze and it is cooler than in the city. There are several food delivery establishments that have no problem delivering there, you just have to tell them that you are in the Paseo del Calvario parking lot. There is no sign restricting the use of motorhomes.

TO ACCESS YOU HAVE TO ENTER FROM THE HEALTH CENTER (C/Molino Medel) The other itineraries are too narrow

title: (23600) Martos - Calle Molino Medel
description: Viewpoint with great views on an esplanade near the hermitage of the town

title: (23689) - Camino Olivares

Un charmant village où vous pourrez profiter des couchers de soleil de la subbética Cordoue et de la sierra méridionale de Jaén. La tranquillité est l'atmosphère qui règne ici. Des itinéraires sont disponibles à proximité pour faire du vélo et de la marche. Idéal pour aller avec des enfants.

name: Camping La Isla
title: (14960) Camping La Isla
description: 3rd category campsite. a lot of unevenness in most of the squares. access to electricity in the square, water must be fetched from a source to fill the CV and auto CV. The sewage must be taken to be emptied in a toilet behind the bar. Greywater to the ground directly. there are no barbecues. many dogs of the owners and of the campers loose, without a muzzle. electricity is shared and breaks frequently. PRICE in April 2023 we paid for 2 days 2 adults and 2 children in a caravan 76 euros.

title: (23780) Lopera - 48 Avenida Andalucia

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - MA-202
description: Mirador Viewpoint. Parked overnight flat. One other van joined us. Normally a viewpoint but trees restrict any view.

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - CO-9003
description: Spring with good drinking water on the street side

title: (14970) Iznájar - Unnamed Road
description: This is not a car park just an overnight parking spot in a dead end.

title: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 5 Calle Vereda del Carmen
title_short: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 5 Calle Vereda del Carmen
description: Hello partners. I park here. It is a quiet area to sleep. You only hear the garbage truck and then after 7 a car that goes to work. I spent the night from Sunday to Monday. I don't know if being next to a park on Friday and Saturday nights there will be an issue with the young people. Greetings and see you on the road.

title: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 9 Calle San Salvador
title_short: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 9 Calle San Salvador
description: Laundry

title: (14978) Iznájar - Unnamed Road
description: Fountain with drinking water

title: (23658) Jamilena - Unnamed Road
description: San Isidro recreational area. Dirt road. Equipped with picnic areas and garbage cans. Complicated access for AC

name: Camping Valdearenas in Iznajar SL.
title: (14979) Camping Valdearenas in Iznajar SL.
description: Camping Valdearenas! Family camping in the countryside. Nautical activities on the lake. Beach valdearenas

title: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 4 Camino Coto
description: Very wide unpaved road at the back of the institute. Super quiet, secluded and plenty of room to park.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 208 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Viewpoint with benches, bins and drinking water point...no long term parking. Water only runs at 3 liters per minute, 1/2 inch thread.

title: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 2 Calle Guitarrista Pepe Ramos
title_short: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 2 Calle Guitarrista Pepe Ramos
description:
Welcome to:
Area for motorhomes, campers...
Nestled in the Sierra Sur de Jaén. Bordering Granada, Jaén and Córdoba, a perfect place to disconnect and get to know Alcalá la Real.

title: (23640) Torredelcampo - 195 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Peri-urban park just 1 km from the city center, with drinking water and quiet area. You can spend the night without problems, no camping.

title: (14979) Iznájar - 5 Calle las Angosturas
description: Parking Next to the Iznajar Pantano Beach. In El Chiringuito de Valdearenas de Gracia and Paco. Super quiet place at night. By day it fills up. We enter with an AC of 7.10 meters without problem as long as you put your ass towards the swamp.

title: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 17 Calle Moreas de Gamboa
title_short: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 17 Calle Moreas de Gamboa
description: Place in the middle of nature in Alcala la Real, the climb is not easy for large motorhomes, I spent the night on the route, there are several routes and a climbing area and a children's park. I had no problems.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 1 Calle el Remolino
description: Multisport center parking area, flat, gravel, garbage cans but no service. Free. Lake nearby.

title: (14620) El Carpio - 31 Diseminado el Carpio
description: Area near the hermitage of San Pedro El Carpio

title: (14970) Iznájar - 14 Calle los Arrayanes
description: Area in front of a playground where you can park (two motorhomes fit loose). we have spent a very quiet night in absolute silence. It is also great to enjoy as a family, both for the playground, as for the small forest behind. And, of course, the Valdearenas beach 100 meters away.

title: (14979) Iznájar - 21 Calle los Arrayanes
description: Water fountain near play area, just passed the Sports facilities. There is also another water source with a screw fitting coming out of the ground further down from the fountain.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 3 Calle los Farfanes
description: Unpaved place on the outskirts of the village. Great view, quiet nights. Camping ban signs . Drinking water at several taps in the direction of the reservoir exhibition.

title: (14970) Iznájar - 1 Plaza de la Venta
description: Small parking lot to visit the village, overnight possible, easily accessible, can be full of cars, but easy ½ ride.

title: (14970) Iznájar - A-333
description: Easy parking for larger vehicles. Hard and level surface

title: (14640) Villa del Río -
description: This is a car park that can take around 6 motorhomes without disturbing the locals. Slight distant road noise from the highway. Quiet town with some shops. The car park is on a good level paved surface and is well lit. Behind the car park there is a river. the small building that can be seen at the entrance is a churrería, wonderful for breakfast in the sun

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - 22 Calle Valentina
title_short: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - 22 Calle Valentina
description: New free area for motorhomes and campers in Cuevas de San Marcos (Málaga). There are three parks very close. Supermarket, bars and sports pavilion less than 5 minutes walk. It has filling and emptying of water. Places of interest to visit: Cueva de Belda, Sierra del Camorro where you can take several hiking trails and visit various viewpoints, Iznajar Reservoir, Genil River. In addition, in the municipality there are several museums such as the toy museum or the path of the millennia.

title: (14978) Iznájar - A-333
description: Small parking for 3 motor homes of 6m or Campers. Right at the end of the bridge over the swamp of Iznájar. Noisy on the road but an option to hang out

title: (14970) Iznájar - 20 Calle las Tres Cruces
description: Perfect, a bit crooked

title: (14640) Villa del Río - 16 Carretera Madrid Cadiz
title_short: (14640) Villa del Río - 16 Carretera Madrid Cadiz
description: Small village super nice and very quiet, parking along a nice little park in the shade

title: (14970) Iznájar - 2 Paseo Donantes de Sangre
description: Parking area where you can spend the night. Very close to the reservoir and with a large sunny square next to it, as well as a park with swings and picnic tables just below.

title: (14630) Pedro Abad - N-IV
description: Handy stopover but very noisy due to the main road nearby.  Chemical disposal point, fresh and waste water points and outdoor urinals. The chemical waste point is rather dirty, but what can you expect from a free stopover I suppose?!  The locals use the area as a walking loop, with or without dogs. The Spanish don't seem to pick up after their dogs so be careful, however, a lady with a long handled brush and dustpan went around the following morning and swept it all up, kudos to her!

title: (14970) Iznájar - Unnamed Road
description: If you have a large motorhome it is practically impossible to go beyond this point and reach the shores of the lake. The road slopes dangerously sideways (except for cars). to get here there is a small descent, a bit narrow but doable. in two minutes you can easily reach the lake on foot. super quiet area and with good 4g reception. take the rubbish away because there are no bins.

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - Unnamed Road
title_short: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos - Unnamed Road
description: Parking and starting point for the circular walk to the caves. I recommend starting the hike east, clockwise.

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos -
description: On the road to the park in nature P4N spot. It’s a bit down hill but is easily accessible for all types of vehicles. It’s in a very green shady area, which must be nice in summers. It’s nice to hike up the road to the other P4N place and Cueva Nueva. From there it’s easy to climb further if you wish to do so.

title: (14970) Iznájar - Paseo Donantes de Sangre
description: Very nice place at the edge of a path that runs along the lake. The location is quite flat and offers a wonderful view of the lake and the white village of Iznajar. Very calm with some joggers in the morning

title: (29210) Cuevas de San Marcos -
description: Quiet place surrounded by nature, perfect for visiting Cueva Belda, the viewpoint of Cueva Nueva and very close to one of the via ferratas in the mountains. The access road is a bit steep but it is not difficult to get there.

title: (14970) Iznájar - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent site in the middle of nature on the edge of the artificial lake. Attention only accessible small vans. Dirt track accessible from the road heading east before the Casa del Olivar. The road from Merendero Iznajar (place located on the cliffs) has collapsed.

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba - A-421
description: Herbal parking at the edge of the river, next to a picnic area and an ornithological circuit. Right next to the motorway exit. Convenient to make a quiet stop (the highway is all the same but does not interfere too much). No ban on motorhome notified. Let's stay discreet, of course. No service. Pretty flat. Clean.

title: (14500) Puente Genil - CO-764
description: Parking at Campo Real train station, where the Subbetica greenway begins.

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba - 1 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Wide and level esplanade next to a gas station, quiet and with a store close by in the town. Ideal for those looking for a quiet place to spend the night or eat, on the way to Seville.

name: Camping La Albolafia
title: (14420) Camping La Albolafia
description: To avoid with a dog, to protect the banging against birds for the corn was very bad for my dog, I didn't sleep almost the whole night, apart from that the camping is great

title: (14511) Córdoba - 1841 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Rest and parking area for the van or AC. It gives access to the 'Bitter Lagoon'.

title: (18270) Montefrío - 12 Avenida Antonio Luis Soler
description: According to National Geographic this village is in the top 10 in the world in terms of views, beautiful village. Where I am about three places for motorhome, but there is another area in the city Funeral for 10 motorhomes.

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba - C. las Adelfas
title_short: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba - C. las Adelfas
description: Small playground with a tap fountain, perfect for refilling jugs

title: (18270) Montefrío - 9 Calle Manuel de Falla
description: Parking without problem for the night and without traffic. Next to the door of a supermarket. With views of the villa and castle of Montefrio.

title: (14913) Zurreón -
description: Nice place for an undisturbed longer stay. Good access to the river. Every now and then a few bathers come from the village, all very nice! Great for dogs.

title: (18270) Montefrío - 3 Huerta Hospital
description: Good parking to visit the town

title: () Loja - CP-74
description: Several spots at side of very quiet rural gravel road on a firm mostly level grassy verge with beautiful views of valley below. Not a single car passed us by on a Friday night. We think there are only 3 or 4 houses further down the road so very quiet indeed.

title: (14910) Benamejí - 5 Calle Blas Infante
description: We stopped here on the way home to rest. The area is paved and a quiet street, Right next to the municipal swimming pool, there is no traffic or noise, we took a walk through the town it is small but pleasant

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba - 13 Calle Víctimas del Terrorismo
title_short: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba - 13 Calle Víctimas del Terrorismo
description: Parking in dawn area. Very calm. To the outside of the town

title: (14910) Benamejí - N-331
description: Gas station with all services, also bathrooms and showers

title: (18312) Iznájar - 31 Calle Granada de Ventorros de Balerma
title_short: (18312) Iznájar - 31 Calle Granada de Ventorros de Balerma
description: Area with a beautiful view of the Iznajar dam, in a very quiet village. With fountains for water filling and next to the playground. On Sundays there is a street market so it is best to park near the school.

address.street: 31 Calle Granada de Ventorros de Balerma

title: (23150) Valdepeñas de Jaén - Unnamed Road
description: Cemetery parking lot, calm and quiet, some shade, water at the entrance to the cemetery, toilets at the bottom of the cemetery with free access.

title: (14910) Benamejí - 75 Calle Mariana Pineda
description: Quiet place to spend the night

title: (23750) Arjonilla - 2 Calle General San Martin
description:
Overnight parking area on the edge of the village.
Infrastructure for electricity, water, showers and dumping are in place but not currently available.
The village has a tourist information centre, museum, castle ruins and air raid shelter.
There is a fresh fruit and vegetable store and a small supermarket. There are also cafes and bars.
The village council are hoping to the facilities for stopping over available as soon as possible.

title: (14600) La Estacion - 1 Calle Pp Atalaya y el Morrón
title_short: (14600) La Estacion - 1 Calle Pp Atalaya y el Morrón
description: It is located on a dead end street that leads to a roundabout. Supermarket 300 meters. There is a hostel next door and a truck parking lot. The place is noisy but it seems safe to spend the night. Currently there is a fire station in the buildings next door.

address.street: 1 Calle Pp Atalaya y el Morrón

title: (23160) Los Villares - JA-3300
description: Cozy place in the olive grove on a quiet side street. Sun from morning to evening.

title: (14600) Montoro - Unnamed Road
description: Montoro cemetery parking lot. Asphalted, leveled, without noise.

title: (14820) Córdoba - N-432
description: Small area with a few trees and picnic tables next to the N432 national road: ideal for taking a break. The place is separated from the road by a fairly high embankment so in case of repair I think we can stay there overnight without being bothered. (I haven't tested it.)

title: (14600) Montoro - 6 Calle Juan Antonio Cervera
description: Public parking behind the bullring. We slept 2 nights there without any problem and very quiet. Nice city, worth visiting. In addition to its old town there is a circular walk through its meanders declared natural monuments.

title: (14600) Montoro - 3 Calle Plano de la Feria
title_short: (14600) Montoro - 3 Calle Plano de la Feria
description: Parking next to the bullring. Quiet and flat place. Very close to the A4, recommended both to visit the town, and to sleep safely if we go en route

title: (23770) Marmolejo - 8 Ronda Norte
description: Small quiet village to spend the night. Close to the highway. Space in the shade, playground for children.

title: (14600) Montoro - 8 Lucio Domenech Martinez
description: Dead end street next to a school and a theater, very quiet. Near the bullring

title: (14029) Córdoba - Autovía del Sur
description: Station cepsa place to park and be able to sleep, very noisy since passes the A4 just next, us not pernoctemos but it is a point in which those who do not have shower can shower for 2 euros since in the area we find not more public showers.

title: (23640) Torre del Campo - CR N-321, 63,4
description: Repsol gas station with shower. When we went it was very clean and new.

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba -
description: Beautiful spot at the parking of a natural parc, with some flat spots. There are a lot of picnic tables and a little playground nearby. Please take your own trash and keep the place clean, so everyone can enjoy!

name: Camping de Benamejí
title: (14910) Camping de Benamejí
description: Camping Benamejí

title: (14600) Montoro - 71 Calle Bartolomé Benítez Romero
description: Big parking with good access. Next to the street but quiet at night. Shops and restaurants near.

title: (14600) Montoro - 215 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Place next to the path that goes next to the Guadalquivir river. Very quiet and a very good place for a morning walk. Easy access. Suitable for a motorhome or 3 vans.

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba -
description: Fantastic place at the observatory for migratory birds. Absolutely quiet and lonely, the view is gigantic. Access via gravel road, a bit bumpy, but no problem without all-wheel drive. No infrastructure, 4 G.

title: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 544 Carretera de Córdoba
title_short: (23680) Alcalá la Real - 544 Carretera de Córdoba
description: Large parking in pebbles attached to the gas station, slept a night in tranquility apart from two cocks that sang.

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba -
description: Perfect esplanade to park and enjoy a beautiful sunset. Very quiet night despite the proximity of the road

title: (14910) Benamejí - Carretera Córdoba - Málaga
description: Small clearing on the shore of the Genil under the ancient bridge of the National Four. Get off just before the bridge to the left as you get off El Tejar. Beware of the current of the River.

title: (14600) Montoro - 2 Calle Cordoneros
description: Parking lot next to the bridge and the Guadalquivir river. Very quiet at night because there are few cars on the road. Good views.

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba -
description: On the edge of a very rarely used gravel road. Beautiful 360° view. The driveway is a bit steep but doable. The small street that turns off is a dead end, further back there are more places.

title: (29220) Cuevas Bajas -
description: Parking area next to a picnic area! Right at the entrance to the town! If you find shade you will be very comfortable! We have stopped to eat and rest and we have not had any problems!

title: (14500) Puente Genil - 5 Calle Membrilleras
description: Lavatory for motorhome

title: (14640) Montoro - 415 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking in the beautiful city of Montoro overlooking the medieval bridge. to the highs of the Guadalquivir. A bit noisy by passers-by until 11 or two weekends and then very quiet and beautiful.

title: (14911) Jauja - 15D Calle Pleito
description: Parking beside the peaceful river genil. Day and night

title: (14500) Puente Genil - 1 Calle Sauce
description: Public motorhome area with grey, black and drinking water emptying service. Next to the shopping center, cinema, bowling alley and gas stations, about 300 meters from the city center and next to the bike path. Visit its old town, bridge, Alianza, Fuente Álamo and its lighting at Christmas. The city of Light, where the Sun becomes sweet.

title: (14029) Córdoba - CH-1
description: Dam of Navallana, Alcolea (Córdoba).

title: (14610) Alcolea - 142 Carretera de Madrid
description: Pump for drinking water with good pressure Greengrocer just opposite. Park in front of it up to 7m or in the parking lot nearby.

title: (23180) Fuerte del Rey -
description: Small parking next to a picnic area, quiet place next to the road (little traffic) maximum 4 vans or motorhomes.

title: (14430) Adamuz - 8 A-421
description: Picnic area a bit abandoned but usable.
